# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new content manager object from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Parameters

- **coder**: An unachiver that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSCoder] class.

## Creating a content manager

- **init()**: Creates a new content manager.
title: init(coder:)
